Translations.Text: BOH yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto trymaye nebo ta zemlyu, lest vony znykayutʹ. Yakshcho budʹ khto shche musyatʹ vlashtuvaty yikh, vony budutʹ naybilʹsh zvychayno znykaty. Vin Clement, Probachayuchy

Vony prysyahnulysya BOHOM urochysto shcho yakshcho warner poyikhaly yim, vony krashche by keruvalysʹ nizh pevnyy congregation! Ale, zaraz shcho warner prybuvalo yim, tse tilʹky porynulo yim bilʹsh hlyboki u antypatiyu

Vony vdalysya do zukhvalosti na zemli, ta zlo zamyshlyayuche, ta z·hubni skhemy tilʹky backfire na tsykh khto zamyshlyayutʹ yikh. Vony todi musyatʹ ochikuvaty budʹ shcho ale dolya tsykh khto musytʹ ti zhe rechi ranishe? Vy znaydete shcho BOZHA systema ye nikoly ne minlyva; vy znaydete shcho BOZHA systema ye nezminna

vony ne blukaly zemlya ta vidznachyly naslidky dlya tsykh khto pereduvaly yim? Vony buly navitʹ mitsnishi nizh vony. Nichoho ne mozhe buty prykhovane z BOHA u nebi, ne na zemli. Vin Omniscient, Omnipotent

Yakshcho b BOH pokarav lyudey dlya yikhnikh hrikhiv, Vin by ne lyshyv yedynyy vytvir na zemli. Ale Vin respites yim dlya predetermined tymchasovi. Odnoho razu yikh tymchasovyy vykonuyetʹsya, todi BOH Seer Yoho sluzhbovtsiv. . S. (Ya Hrishatʹ)
Yaa Dyvyvsya
Ta Quran tse povno wisdom
Naybilʹsh bezperechno, vy (Rashad) ye odni z kur'yeriv
Na pryamomu shlyakhu
Tse vidkryttya ye z Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
Shchob poperedyty lyudey chyyi batʹky nikoly ne buly poperedzheni, ta tomu, vony unaware
Tse predetermined shcho bilʹshistʹ yikh ne vvazhayutʹ
Dlya my rozmishchuyemo navkolo yikhnikh kaydaniv shyy, do yikhnikh pidboriddya. Otzhe, vony stayutʹ zamkneni u yikhnʹomu disbelief
Ta my rozmishchuyemo bar'yer pered nymy, ta bar'yerom pozadu nykh, ta otzhe, my yim vuali; vony ne mozhutʹ pobachyty
Tse yavlyaye soboyu toy zhe samyy vy poperedzhayete chy yim abo ne, vony ne mozhutʹ poviryty

Vy budete zvazhatysya na tilʹky tsymy khto uphold tse povidomlennya, ta povaha naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyva - navitʹ koly vyklyuchno u yikhniy tayemnosti. Dayte yim harnu novynu forgiveness ta velykodushnoyi vynahorody
My zvychayno ozhyvemo mertvyy, ta my zapysaly vse vony zrobyly u tse zhyttya, tak zhe, yak i naslidky shcho prodovzhuyutʹsya pislya yikhnʹoyi smerti. Vse my rozrakhuvaly u hlybokomu zapysi
Tsytuyutʹ dlya nykh pryklad lyudey u spilʹnoti shcho otrymav kur'yeriv
Koly my poslaly yim dva (kur'yery), vony disbelieved yim. My todi pidtrymaly yikh treti. Vony skazaly, "My (bozhyy) kur'yery do vas
Vony skazaly, "Vy ne vyhlyadayete bilʹsh nizh lyudsʹki istoty yak ny. Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy ne poslaty vnyz budʹ shcho. Vy brekhuny
Vony skazaly, "Nash Lord znaye shcho my buly poslani do vas
Nasha yedyna misiya musytʹ dostavyty povidomlennya
Vony skazaly, "My roz·hlyadayemo vas pohani oznaky. Yakshcho ne vy utrymuyetesya, my budemo bezsumnivno kam'yani vy, abo afflict vy z bolisnym retribution
Vony skazaly, "Vasha oznaka zalezhytʹ vid vashoyi vidpovidi, zaraz shcho vy nahaduvatysya. Diysno, vy porushuyete lyudey
lyudyna prybula z inshoho kintsya mista, kazhuchy, "O moyi lyudy, sliduyutʹ za kur'yeramy
Sliduyete "za tsymy khto ne prosyte vas dlya budʹ-yakoyi zarplaty, ta keruyetesʹ
Chomu ya ne mushu obozhnyuvaty khto vystupyv z initsiatyvoyu meni, ta yomu musytʹ ye vashe ostatochne vidshkoduvannya
ya 'Budu vstanovyty bilya bohiv Yoho? Yakshcho naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy willed budʹ-yaka shkoda dlya mene, yikhnye zastupnytstvo ne mozhe dopomohty meni kozhnyy kusav, ne mozhe vony ryatunok meni
U takomu vypadku, ya by buv povnistyu astray
ya viryv v vashomu Lordu; budʹ laska poslukhayte meni
(Pid chas yoho smerti) vin buv kazanyy, "Vnosyatʹ Ray." Vin skazav, "O, ya by khotiv, shchob moyi lyudy znaly
Shcho miy Lord prostyv meni, ta zrobyv meni pochesnyy
